chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product iPhone 13 mini has the above problem:

I bought the device in mid-January. The battery was claimed to be original. Initially, the battery capacity was at 100%. The battery capacity is now only 79%!

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,


der Kunde hat uns soeben gemeldet, dass seine Akkukapazität bei 79% liegt.

Ich habe dem Kunden mitgeteilt, dass er das Gerät für einen Umtausch einsenden kann

Thanks for your help,
Fatma, Back Market Customer Care

Dear ecomobile


The customer has just informed us that his battery capacity is 79%.

I have informed the customer that he can send the device in for an exchange

Regards,
Fatma from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare, kindly relay the following message to the customer. 

We are very sorry to hear about this issue. Rather than sending a return, would you consider a 50 euros commercial gesture instead? 
You could contribute significantly in reducing the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers in facilitating a return of a device. 
This would definitely be a big help to our eco-friendly efforts to save our environment.

Thank you.

Regards,
YR

Dear Backcare,

Since the customer has bought the device mid January and the battery warranty only lasts for 1 month, we are unable to help repair/exchange the phone or the battery. Hence, the customer is not able to send the device in for an exchange. Could you kindly inform the customer about this. Thank you for your patience and assistance. 

Regards,
CH

Dear Backcare,

Please disregard the message regarding the commercial gesture as the battery warranty is over already. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile

here the text of the Qualitycharter


Regards,
Fatma from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare, 

Kindly relay the following message to the customer.

We are very sorry to hear about this issue. Rather than sending a return, would you consider a 50 euros commercial gesture instead? With the 20 euros, you can use this amount to fund the next battery replacement at a neighborhood mobile repair shop. 
You could contribute significantly in reducing the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers in facilitating a return of a device.
This would definitely be a big help to our eco-friendly efforts to save our environment.

Thank you.

Regards,
JH

Dear Backcare,

Please disregard the previous message.

Kindly relay the following message to the customer.

We are very sorry to hear about this issue. Rather than sending a return, would you consider a 50 euros commercial gesture instead? With the 50 euros, you can use this amount to fund the next battery replacement at a neighborhood mobile repair shop.
You could contribute significantly in reducing the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers in facilitating a return of a device.
This would definitely be a big help to our eco-friendly efforts to save our environment.

Thank you.

Regards,
JH
